üè∑Ô∏è"... is a bakery treat that possesses subtle syrup notes. This flavor does well in other bakery recipes or when accented with fruits or creams!." - [ECX Link: French Toast by Flavors Express](https://ecigexpress.com/products/french-toast-flavor-by-flavor-express?variant=17264143073338)

​

Suggested Usage Rate: 2-3% - [Vaperstek Link: French Toast Flavoring](https://www.vaperstek.org/super-concentrated-french-toast-flavoring/) (***Allegedly*** *Super Concentrated flavorings offered on Vaperstek are the same products as Flavor Express on EcigExpress, and SC's on Bull City Flavors. I have not compared products and purchased the flavoring from ECX*).

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

Aroma Stick: Milky Dairy Butter (dom) with a hint of bakery

​

Single Flavor Test:  2.5%

60/40 | 0 Nic | Single 316L SS Fused Clapton | asMODus C4 RDA | Organic Japanese Cotton

\_ \_ \_ \_ \_

1 Week Steep

​

‚ñ∫Tester Bottle

\- Aroma: Aroma Intensity ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Description: Light Buttery‚Ä¶Caramel

\- Knuckle: Sweet and Tart. Butter. Caramel‚Ä¶hint of Bakery

​

‚ñ∫Vape

\- Flavor Intensity: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Sweetness: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Flavor Description: Natural, Yeasty and Dry Bread (dominate) with Soft Notes of a Smooth Light Dairy Butter, and hint of Sweet Toasted Brown Sugar. Medium Body with a Drying Mouthfeel.

​

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes: Very Faint hint of Butryic Acid on Butter (not offensive / easily identifiable)

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

2 Week Steep

​

‚ñ∫Vape - Changes

\- Flavor Intensity: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Sweetness: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è ‚Üë

\- Flavor Description: Changes ‚Äì Tartness ‚Üì with a less Drying Mouth Feel. Dry Bready Flavor softened and Sweetened by Light Butter and more identifiable sweet Brown Sugar Notes.

​

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes: None ‚Äì Soft Butyric Acid Note Gone

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

3 Week Steep

​

‚ñ∫Vape

\- Flavor Intensity: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Sweetness: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Flavor Description: Natural and Warm. Soft and Bready Toast\* with Lighter notes of a Tart Yeast. Bread flavor is Lightly Sweetened with notes of a Sweet Brown Sugar and a hint of Butter. Medium Bodied with a Mild Drying Mouthfeel.

​

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes: No Identifiable Off Notes

\- No Heavy Fried Oil, Syrup /Maple, or Noticeable Eggy Notes

\- Flavor is more Akin to a Sugar Sweetened Bread

\- Bread Notes shares similar characteristics as a Light White Cake\*

‚ñ∫Mixing % Estimate\*

Usage: 1% min ‚Ä¢ 2-3% med ‚Ä¢ 4-5?% max
